Select one of the methods shown
A secret confirmation code will be generated and send by e-mail or SMS. Select the method of your choice and click next to generate and send the code.

text_eval.javascript:
return data['voConfirmationCodeSendCountLeft'] > 0
	? data['vTimerConfirm'] >= 0
		? `When nothing is received, the confirmation code can be resend in ${data['vTimerConfirm']} seconds.`
		: 'Click the Resend button to send the confirmation code again.'
	: 'Cannot resend - maximum limit reached'

unit.text_value: The secret confirmation code is received either by SMS or e-mail, depending on the option selected. Enter the code to continue. If no code is received, select another option.
Your description field is a text value that will be stored for your account. It can be any that value that is related to your target account. If you don't know what to specify, just enter some text.

Entering a mobile phone number allows the system to send a one-time PIN code via SMS during password recovery. This PIN helps verify the user's identity, ensuring only the rightful account owner can reset the password.
Please fill all the required form fields.
- password and confirmed password must match
Onboarding completed successfully. Your account is enabled and the password is set. A confirmation mail is send to your account. If you have any questions, please contact the helpdesk.
Message contents. The contents of this message could be long but on the other hand, it could also be very short. We don't know in advance since the message isn't known yet.
This message was generated by the onboarding process. If you do not know what to do next, please contact the helpdesk at the following number: 1-2345-6789. Thank you for using our services!

meta_config.notes: App for managing onboarding for users
